content:
Before their performance, Madison, one of the members of Harmony Hearts, wrote a song for their incoming performance. The song was called "Rise Again" and the lyrics were as follows:

Verse 1:
We've been through the storm, we've felt the pain
But we're not gonna let it break us, no we'll rise again
We'll take all the lessons that we've learned
And we'll use them to make our dreams come true

Chorus:
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll show the world that we're not broken
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll be the light in the darkness

Verse 2:
We'll take all the pieces of our broken dreams
And we'll build them up into something new
We'll chase our dreams and we'll make them real
We'll be the change that we want to see

Chorus:
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll show the world that we're not broken
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll be the light in the darkness

Bridge:
We've got this fire burning in our hearts
And nothing's gonna stop us now
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
And we'll make our dreams come true

Chorus:
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll show the world that we're not broken
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll be the light in the darkness

Outro:
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll make our dreams come true
We'll rise again, we'll shine again
We'll be the light in the darkness.
